definition: (TCM) to relieve inflamation and internal heat/to detoxify
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: Serological typing for 27 strains of Clostridium sapticum were investigated using tube agglutination test ( AT ) .
sentences.chinese: 本文對27株敗毒梭菌進行了抗原的血清學分型。
